explanation: [0-0] A girl in school uniform and black-framed glasses wears a red hairpin on her head. Her mouth is open, her lips are reddish, and she raises her right hand in front of her. There is a white plate in front of the girl, with a bucket of cooked instant noodles on it. Behind the girl is a white background. Above the girl are four pictures: instant noodles, kiwi fruit, rice balls, and ice cream.

[0-7] Then, the girl in school uniform puts her right hand to her lips. The shot cuts to a hand with red liquid on it. Then it cuts back to the girl who has a disdainful expression. Immediately afterwards, the girl picks up the instant noodles and uses chopsticks in her left hand to pick up a mouthful of noodles and bring them to her mouth. When the noodles touch the girl's lips, she opens her mouth wide and screams. Then a red circle appears on the instant noodles picture above.
